name: Eternal Winter (itch) (Arekun Games)
description:
This is my first game and it's an attempt to capture the spirit of Christmas. This is an early version of the game and there is no gameplay yet. Just walk around and explore. Within the time before this years' Christmas I will try to progress as much as possible and post some updates every once in a while. 

Latest Update from v0.1 to v0.1.1: Menu added + Movement fixed

The character I used is "Satomi" from A2 Games

The background music is called "Snowy Winter's Night" from opengameart.org
